channel.title: Can somebody help me find a genuine sony xperia z3 screen? :)
channel.description:
I've looked on eBay, Amazon but nobody has a genunine screen for my phone! I want to replace my broken screen :(
Help??

item.title: Can somebody help me find a genuine sony xperia z3 screen? :)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:6, topic:547596”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=666504.msg4456182#msg4456182 date=1415043722]

I can’t use my phones screen, the top half and left don’t respond. It’s been a pain to try load Google voice to do everything.

On the Box is says D6603 Black.

Was it just the digitizer that was cracked, or the screen too?

The screen.

Edit: The frame has serveral dents around it too. Is there a way to replace that??
[/quote]
If you cracked the screen it shouldn’t display anything at all, thats why I asked. The digitizer is much cheaper to replace if the screen is intact.

If you need screen and digitizer: http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/New-Touch-Digitizer-LCD-Display-Assembly-For-Sony-Xperia-Z3-D6603-D6643-D6653-/361073208456?pt=UK_Replacement_Parts_Tools&hash=item5411a3ec88
or just digitizer: http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/New-Black-Touch-Digitizer-Screen-Replace-For-Sony-Xperia-Z3-D6603-D6643-D6653-/111490517778?pt=UK_Replacement_Parts_Tools&hash=item19f55a4b12

If you want genuine with the Sony logo your best bet is to either send it in to them or try and buy the replacement parts from them. I can’t find the Z3 Frame either, only the Z3 compact.[/quote]
I was quoted at a repair shop for around £180 for the new screen + installation. Sony will probably charge much more. I cannot send it back to them because I don’t have a backup phone.

Thanks though. You unblock my pm’s too.

Read full topic
item.source: Can somebody help me find a genuine sony xperia z3 screen? :)

item.title: Can somebody help me find a genuine sony xperia z3 screen? :)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:5, topic:547596”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=666504.msg4456181#msg4456181 date=1415043652]

I can’t use my phones screen, the top half and left don’t respond. It’s been a pain to try load Google voice to do everything.

On the Box is says D6603 Black.

Was it just the digitizer that was cracked, or the screen too?
[/quote]
The screen.

Edit: The frame has serveral dents around it too. Is there a way to replace that??[/quote]
If you cracked the screen it shouldn’t display anything at all, thats why I asked. The digitizer is much cheaper to replace if the screen is intact.

If you need screen and digitizer: http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/New-Touch-Digitizer-LCD-Display-Assembly-For-Sony-Xperia-Z3-D6603-D6643-D6653-/361073208456?pt=UK_Replacement_Parts_Tools&hash=item5411a3ec88
or just digitizer: http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/New-Black-Touch-Digitizer-Screen-Replace-For-Sony-Xperia-Z3-D6603-D6643-D6653-/111490517778?pt=UK_Replacement_Parts_Tools&hash=item19f55a4b12

If you want genuine with the Sony logo your best bet is to either send it in to them or try and buy the replacement parts from them. I can’t find the Z3 Frame either, only the Z3 compact.
